channel.title: Making a member
channel.description: well ok i am using a project czar because thats what my friend wanted but do u know how to make people a member on it? because i can't

item.title: Making a member
item.dc:creator: @trevor268 trevor268
item.description:
@trevor268 wrote:

go into your client file and do ctrl + f and search for makemem and it will look liek this

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Reforced") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ipkevery1") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Purez") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("W00lf") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("I Murder I") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bb Pur3d") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("X k0 pl0x x") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Fav Mage") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("I Phree Xp I") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Firegoddesk") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xx lmfao xx") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Global")))) { {

change to this

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && (playerRights >= 2)) { {

then when you are making someone member type makemem(name) with no spaces it will say wrong syntax but it doesnt matter kick them twice and they will be member

Read full topic

item.title: Making a member
item.dc:creator: @someone123456 someone123456
item.description:
@someone123456 wrote:

Lol go to data/members/ then add their name there

I am currently trying to find out how to make everyone member when they log in so if anyone know ide appreciate it.
